remarks: Remove from ~ rexcom4 dependency on ~ ax-ext and ~ ax-13 (and on ~ df-or , ~ df-tru , ~ df-sb , ~ df-clab , ~ df-cleq , ~ df-clel , ~ df-nfc , ~ df-v ).  This proof uses only ~ df-rex on top of first-order logic.  (Contributed by BJ, 13-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-rexcom4 $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y ph <-> E. y E. x e. A ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
